settings.relayMenuText0: Use the Nostr common relay setting (kind: 10002)

toast.relayError: The list of relays must include at least one read and one writeable relay.

beforeUnload.message: Changed settings are not saved. Would you like to leave the page?

nostviewstr.kind30007: Edit Mute by kind (kind:30007) in NostViewstr

settings.globalRelay: (List with ID (d tag) of KIND:30002 as global is used as Global Relay.)

display.loadImage: Load and display image (Real-time profile update ON/OFF)
display.menu: Display the menu button on the left side.
display.showRelayIcon: Relay information is displayed under the icon
display.banner: Show the account banner on the right
display.showClientTag: Show Display client tag (via) in TL

emoji.notes: Emojis that contain NIP violation shortcodes are excluded.

settings.relay: The changes will take effect after reloading.

usage.title: Settings that affect data consumption: ↑Highest to ↓Lowest

save.rewrite: A data entry with the same name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
save.new: Do you want to create a new entry with the specified name?

load.title: Load/Save Settings
load.description: Stored in the relay with kind: 300078 ID: lumi-settings (NIP-78)
load.title2: Load Settings / Save Current Settings to Relay
load.description2: If a data entry with the same name exists, it will be overwritten.

post.confirm: There is unposted text. Are you sure you want to close?
post.quote: You can cite users and posts with nostr:npub..., nostr:nevent....
post.hell: You are about to reply to more than 30 people. Are you sure you want to proceed?
post.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this? This action cannot be undone.

petname.write: Can set the display name (petname) of the follow users.
petname.warning: Since it's public, avoid names that could be problematic.

menu.removeConfirm: Do you want to remove this channel from your list?
menu.addConfirm: Do you want to add this channel to your list?

create.title: Create New Channel

create.addToList: Add this channel to my personal list
create.error: Failed to create channel. Please try again.

list.settingswarning: To view the list page, you need to set up a pubkey

about.luminostr: When your follow list, bookmarks, etc. are lost

create_kind3.newMessage: If a follow list already exists, it will be reset. Is it okay to create a new one?
create_kind3.message: The follow list could not be found. Please click the button below to create a new follow list.
create_kind3.reload: The page will reload after creation.

description.global: Use relay set with dtag of kind:30002 as global.
description.search2: If kind:10007 is not found, use default relay settings.
description.search3: Please set up relays that has search function.

shortcut.title: Keyboard Shortcut
shortcut.CtrlEnter: Submit the post (from the Create Post Window)

message.0: Thank you for using Lumilumi. Please use the new domain https://lumilumi.app from now on.
message.1: If you want to transfer your settings, you can save and restore them by clicking the "Upload/Download current configuration to relay" button at the bottom of the settings page.
message.2: The "Sync" settings will not be transferred, so please click each button again to synchronize.

nostrlogin.description: This website is part of the Nostr network. Log in with your Nostr profile or sign up to join.
